title: Trample (6R82)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a mounted [Raider] Man to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may add (4) to prevent this.
Lore:	”'…I stomp round and round, / Never lie on the ground, / Not even to die. / Oliphaunt am I….'”
Rarity:	R
